attributes.action: Add Covid Booster Vaccine to patient QR code
attributes.additional_details: Adding Covid booster vaccine data to patient QR codes should be automatically done. You are encouraging people to have the booster and to travel. Failure to make booster vaccine data available potentially hinders those who are eligible for the booster to travel freely.
attributes.background: I want you to act quickly to add Covid Booster Vaccine record to patient QR codes to ensure ease of travel. This is currently not happening and should be automatic.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced that Boosters and third doses will appear on the COVID Pass in England, making it easy for people to show their vaccine status when travelling abroad: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/boosters-to-be-added-to-nhs-covid-pass-for-travel
